name: Fast Fight
description:
Fast Fight

Fast Fight is a 2D indie game that puts you in the shoes of a runner who must battle against 1 to 9 other NPCs while collecting weapons hidden in boxes.

 This game combines the fast-paced action of a line runner game with the strategic gameplay of a deathmatch battle. Despite its simple graphics and sound effects, Fast Fight offers a thrilling and intense experience for players.

Download fast fight now!
